p: The net photosynthetic rate (Pn) of Pueraria was significantly higher than that of Mikania when grown alone or under interspecific competition (Figure 6a). Competition did not affect the Pn of Pueraria but reduced the Pn of Mikania when the mix ratio of Pueraria to Mikania reached 3:1 (Figure 6a). Water use efficiency (WUE) showed a similar response with the WUE of Pueraria being significantly higher than that of Mikania under various planting arrangements (Figure 6b).
